name: Celestion
description: Celestion rarely appears from the void, their wings emit a strange energy and can evaporate objects that get too close

name: Solarion
description: Self sufficient and able to produce their own light, Solarion often live in solidarity

name: Mangris
description: Mangris are able to confuse prey with their floral crest to approach near enough to grab them with their deadly pincirs

name: Sporeleon
description: Able to traverse up tall trees, Sporeleon are often found perched high in the canopy

name: Bazub
description: Bazub swarms are deadly and destructive, a swarm can destroy an entire crop in minutes

name: Bolbon
description: Bolbon can sometimes be inactive for so long, that moss, shrubs or even small trees can grow on them

name: Nocterra
description: Nocterra can spread halucinogenic pollen which can severely disorient travellers

name: Lycospore
description: Each of Lycospores billions of spores is potent enough to immobilise an attacker for upto several hours

name: Florean
description: Florean vines are extremely durable, they can root themselves to the ground and become immovable

name: Koranok
description: Koranok claws are able to burrow through bedrock to nest

name: Sharakus
description: Sharakus are able to generate enough power while swimming to cause waves overhead several hundred metres overhead

name: Sujin
description: Sujin are mischevious tricksters that are able to shape their watery bodies at will to mimic anything they have already seen

name: Leviathan
description: Leviathan usually drift through the deep ocean

name: Seaqueen
description: Seaqueen horns are coated with a powerful toxin that can potentially paralyze a target or attacker for several days

name: Naga
description: The Naga have a powerful muscular body allowing them to manoeuvre underwater with ease

name: Mermos
description: Despite not having bones, each tentacle on a Mermos is capable of crushing small rocks

name: Glacioise
description: The icey shards on the back of Glacioise move around so slowly that its often mistaken as a solid

name: Antarcticus
description: The wings of an Antarcticus emit a cold that can cause saturated clouds to erupt in snow when passed

name: Woover
description: Woovers travel in packs and able to chase down prey over extremely long distances

name: Lavekans
description: Lavekans can be very territorial, and will try to kill any unwelcome intruder by biting it, wrapping around and greatly increasing their body temperature

name: Calidus
description: When Calidus sense a threat they can start to burn hot enough to emit waves capable of burning steel from several metres away

name: Magmus
description: Magmus ooze a trail of lava as they move that can continue burning for several hours

name: Chargoyle
description: Chargoyles usually nest in groups and are easily startled, often erupting their manes simultaneously at any perceived threat

name: Firadactus
description: Firadactus use hot air under their wings to aid their flight, allowing them to soar for many days without needing to rest

name: Ignis
description: When harmed Ignis emit a strong odour that alerts its hive of attackers

name: Blazeo
description: If threatened, Blazeo fans out its burning tail to shield itself from attacks

name: Phoenix
description: When Phoenix shed feathers, they can continue to burn unaided for many years, even underwater

name: Flamus
description: Flamus can burn hot enough to melt the ground they stand on

name: Goblen
description: Goblens are social and work in groups, they can effectively communicate with eachother over long distances using their flames

name: Depedus
description: Though hundreds of metres below ground, Depedus can be so heavy they shake the earth above them causing quakes

name: Darthys
description: If something is killed nearby a Darthys, their soul may be sucked into the crystal on their back and trapped forever

name: Wraith
description: Wraith claws are harder than diamonds and can easily cut through steel

name: Wanderer
description: Wanderers are said to be powerful warrior spirits, traveling the world, still searching for a worthy opponent

name: Baphomet
description: The Baphomet are highly deceptive shapeshifters that once commited may maintain a disguise for a whole human lifetime

name: Sentinel
description: Because they have no desires of their own, a Sentinel can stay alert in guard position indefinitely

name: Elkar
description: The glowing golden antlers of the Elkar are so dense they can charge through diamond boulders

name: Lumenicia
description: Highly sensitive, Lumenicia are able to communicate with light

name: Gryphon
description: Gryphon can whip their tail to send a shockwave capable cutting through boulders from upto 20 metres away

name: Pegasus
description: Pegasus gallop through the sky at such a speed and shine so bright, that they are often mistaken for shooting stars

name: Templar
description: Templar wings are incredibly powerful allowing them to dart through the air and stop or take off immediately
